mapper.insert: insert into t_goods_rule (id, rule_name, rule_value, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, rule_name, rule_value, create_date, update_date from t_goods_rule

select id, rule_name, rule_value, create_date, update_date from t_goods_rule where 1=1
and rule_name like concat('%', #{goodsRuleBean.ruleName},'%')
order by create_date desc
